name: Workshop Cabin: Ship Ashore
description: A boat-shaped building commonly seen around the Clink-Clank Krumkake Craftshop. It's pieced together from sheet metal and has two slender, curved smokestacks.\nIt's said the original creator intended to build an actual iron vessel, but flawed craftsmanship left it leaking before it could leave the shallows. After several failed attempts, the creator transformed it into the boat-shaped structure it is now. Only, they did not expect it to become the iconic workshop landmark for its appearance...
